data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 2, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Kashima.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kashima.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Yasuto Wakizaka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Kashima drives forward and Shoma Doi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Kawasaki.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 15, Kashima have a goal kick.
Juan Alano of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 18, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Yasuto Wakizaka.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Ayase Ueda (Kashima) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Free kick Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
In the minute 28, Kawasaki takes a corner from the left.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Kawasaki are caught offside.
Kashima drive upfield and Leo Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kawasaki defender.
In the minute 32, Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Juan Alano (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashima's Kei Koizumi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Kawasaki.
Shogo Taniguchi (Kawasaki) gets a yellow card.
Everaldo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima are coming forward and Everaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Free kick Kashima.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 42, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashima make their first substitution with Shintaro Nago replacing Juan Alano.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 50, Kengo Nakamura (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Kyohei Noborizato, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Kashima.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tomoya Inukai is booked for the home team.

Kawasaki drive upfield and Leandro Damiao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Everaldo (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Ayase Ueda (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kashima Soccer Stadium.

Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.

Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 63, Shoma Doi (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.

In the minute 64, Rikuto Hirose is replacing Kei Koizumi for the home team.
Free kick Kashima.

In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Kawasaki takes a corner from the left.
Miki Yamane of Kawasaki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
Kashima's Everaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, Goal! Everaldo equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Kashima.
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Yasuto Wakizaka's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Tatsuya Hasegawa is on a sub for Kaoru Mitoma for Kawasaki.
Hokuto Shimoda is replacing Yasuto Wakizaka for the away team.
In the minute 79, Leandro Damiao (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.

In the minute 84, Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.

Corner awarded to Kashima.
Shuto Yamamoto (Kashima) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 88, The away team replace Akihiro Ienaga with Manabu Saito.
The away team replace Leandro Damiao with Kazuya Yamamura.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Kashima.
Kawasaki's Kazuya Yamamura is on target but unsuccessful.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashima's Shuto Yamamoto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
Free kick Kashima.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Jesiel (Kawasaki) has received a first yellow card.
Kento Misao (Kashima) has been sent off!
